name: SlashCommandRouter
description: Router for registering and dispatching slash command handlers. Handlers receive a context with the interaction and helper methods.

important_methods.name: register(name:handler)
important_methods.description: Register a handler for a slash command name.

important_methods.name: handle(interaction)
important_methods.description: Internal: dispatch an incoming interaction to the registered handler.

notes: Call `useSlashCommands(_:)` on `DiscordClient` to wire router into event dispatch. Handlers are run in async context and may `throw`.
